name: 23rd Silent Film Concert Festival
description: The 23rd Silent Film Concert Festival invites audiences to experience masterpieces of early cinema accompanied by new live film music and extraordinary artistic interpretations. The festival reimagines silent-era classics through contemporary composition and performance, bridging historical cinema with experimental sound practices. This is not nostalgiaâ€”it's an active reconsideration of what film music can be when freed from synchronized sound, allowing improvisation, reinterpretation, and radical scoring.
